name: 張瑋倫
objective:
本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.
schedule:
Week 1: 課程介紹
Week 2: 數位轉型與服務創新
Week 3: 顧客價值共創
Week 4: 科技應用服務創新
Week 5: 服務藍圖
Week 6: 報告與討論
scorePolicy:
出席率: 30%
課堂討論(報告與討論): 70%
materials: Selected articles, papers, consulting reports, and prepared slides from Harvard Business database.
